title: Andrew An Chen
text:
Assistant Professor of Biostatistics
Medical University of South Carolina

Research Interests
Imaging statistics, statistical harmonization, network analysis, distributed data analysis, nonparametric statistics


Applied Areas
Structural magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), functional MRI, diffusion tensor MRI, transcriptomics, electronic health records, wearable device data
